titles.title: To permit Members of the House of Representatives to use funds provided in Member's Representational Allowances to obtain POW/MIA flags and distribute them to constituents.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 5/14/2003--Introduced. Authorizes a Member of the House of Representatives to use amounts provided in the Member's Representational Allowance to obtain POW/MIA flags and distribute them to constituents in connection with official and representational duties.
